thread.title: Comfy room and great location
thread.title_full: Comfy room and great location - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CÃ©sar M
title: Comfy room and great location
text: The location is great, close to the subway station and close to one of the most famous touristic building in New York, the Empire State. The staff was very kind. Negative point: I've been there in December, and the central heat was a little bit too warm, I would prefer if I could choose my favorite temperature in my room.
